trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma matriz de controlo de controlos ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: The `BaseOCXArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 ActiveX control array.
trans-unit.target: O `BaseOCXArray` classe fornece um equivalente para a funcionalidade de tempo de execução de uma matriz de controlo ActiveX do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: Não fornece as funcionalidades de tempo de criação de uma matriz de controlo do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funções e objetos no <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>espaço de nomes são fornecidos para utilização pelas ferramentas de para atualizar a partir do Visual Basic 6.0 para [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, estas funções e objetos duplicar funcionalidades que pode encontrar em outros espaços de nomes no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: São necessárias apenas quando o modelo de código Visual Basic 6.0 significativamente difere de acordo com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a `BaseOCXArray`, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: Quando instanciar um `BaseOCXArray`, também tem de chamar o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>método para criar o elemento inicial na matriz.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o foco, utilizando o teclado (SEPARADOR, SHIFT + TAB e assim sucessivamente) ou ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>ocorrem de eventos de foco de método, pela seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Quando altera o foco, utilizando o rato ou ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>ocorrem de eventos de foco de método, pela seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo perde ou ganha captura do rato.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp` Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: Clicar num botão do rato, quando o ponteiro é efetuada através de uma forma normalmente gera a seguinte série de eventos de controlo: `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp` dois cliques que ocorrem fechar suficiente no tempo, conforme determinado pelas definições de rato do sistema de operativo do utilizador, irá gerar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>eventos em vez do segundo `MouseClick` eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>eventos são logicamente nível mais elevado de um controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: São, muitas vezes, são gerados por outras ações, como premir a tecla ENTER, quando o controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>do controlo redimensionado, pode converter a `sender` parâmetro do <xref:System.EventArgs>dados para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade (ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Propriedades individualmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: Para processar esquemas personalizados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>eventos em vez do `Resize` eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>o evento é gerado em resposta a um `Resize` eventos, mas também em resposta a outras alterações que afetam o esquema do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o foco, utilizando o teclado (SEPARADOR, SHIFT + TAB e assim sucessivamente), chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>métodos, ou definindo a propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>ao formulário atual, ocorrem eventos de foco pela seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Quando altera o foco, utilizando o rato ou chamar o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, eventos de foco ocorrerem pela seguinte ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>estiver definida como `false` , o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating>e `Validated` eventos são suprimidos.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
